name: Plantome
description:
History:

You decided to become an agronomist, but you were too lazy to leave the house and you planted a seed on the windowsill.

The life of the plant depends only on you.

Controls 
  • A-D - Left\Right controll
  • S - Start game 
  • W - Use

(supports gamepad)

Gameplay

You need to keep the plant in the light and water based on the sensors. Collect 30 fruits and you will win the game.

Credits
  • Denis Chasovoy - Code, Music
  • Skazochnik - Art
